trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，支援2。（在至多两个目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。） {1}：选择目标其上有指示物的生物。本回合中，当该生物死去时，将该牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Arcane Artisan
trans-unit.target: 秘法工匠

trans-unit.resname: BBD·33 | Arcane Artisan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}：目标牌手抓一张牌，然后从其手上放逐一张牌。如果以此法放逐的是生物牌，则该牌手派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该牌的复制品。 当CARDNAME离开战场，在下一个结束步骤开始时，放逐所有以它派出的衍生物。

trans-unit.source: Fumble
trans-unit.target: 不慎失手

trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Gain control of all Auras and Equipment that were attached to it, then attach them to another creature.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。获得所有结附于其上之灵气与装备于其上之武具的操控权，然后将这些灵气与武具全部结附或装备在另一个生物上。

trans-unit.source: A moment of distraction, a lifetime of regret.
trans-unit.target: 分心一时，后悔一世。

trans-unit.source: Game Plan
trans-unit.target: 夺标计划

trans-unit.resname: BBD·35 | Game Plan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.)\nEach player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{5}。） 每位牌手将其手牌与坟墓场洗入其牌库，然后各抓七张牌。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Plan for victory, or prepare for defeat.
trans-unit.target: 不为胜利作谋划，便要为失败作准备。

trans-unit.source: Huddle Up
trans-unit.target: 耳语谋策

trans-unit.resname: BBD·36 | Huddle Up | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Assist (Another player can pay up to {2} of this spell's cost.)\nTwo target players each draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{2}。） 两位目标牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Are you sure this is going to work?" asked Will. "No," said Rowan. "But if it does, it's going to be spectacular."
trans-unit.target: 「你确定这招能成功？」威尔问。 「不确定，」萝婉说。「但如果成功了，就会壮观万分。」

trans-unit.source: Nimbus Champion
trans-unit.target: 玄云斗士

trans-unit.resname: BBD·37 | Nimbus Champion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may return target creature to its owner's hand if that creature's power is less than or equal to the number of Warriors your team controls.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，如果目标生物的力量等于或小于由你队伍操控之战士的数量，则你可以将该生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·38 | Out of Bounds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Out of Bounds
trans-unit.target: 越线出界

trans-unit.source: Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)\nCounter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{3}。） 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·38 | Out of Bounds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The wardens watch for illegal tactics and protect spectators from the occasional rogue fireball.
trans-unit.target: 竞技场守卫的职责在于制止选手使用违规战术，以及防止失控的火球误伤观众。

trans-unit.source: Saltwater Stalwart
trans-unit.target: 海生壮汉

trans-unit.resname: BBD·39 | Saltwater Stalwart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to an opponent, target player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME向对手造成伤害时，目标牌手抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Every attack is a test of your defenses. Every hit marks the map of your defeat.
trans-unit.target: 每次攻势都考验你的防线。每次得手都降低你的胜算。

trans-unit.source: Soaring Show-Off
trans-unit.target: 翱翔耀扬客

trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Some spectators love an underdog, but others are just as happy to support a proven winner.
trans-unit.target: 有些观众偏爱赛场黑马，而另一些人则从支持夺魁热门中找到乐趣。

trans-unit.source: Spellseeker
trans-unit.target: 觅咒师

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于2的瞬间或法术牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Mages and warriors recruited from across Kylem display their skills at Valor's Reach.
trans-unit.target: 来自全凯勒姆的法师与战士在英勇巅各展身手。

trans-unit.source: Spellweaver Duo
trans-unit.target: 织咒搭档

trans-unit.resname: BBD·42 | Spellweaver Duo | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{6}。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标已横置的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Synchronized spell weaving is a difficult but rewarding skill to master.
trans-unit.target: 熟练掌握同步织咒这项技艺十分困难，但回报颇丰。

trans-unit.source: Zndrsplt's Judgment
trans-unit.target: 岑斯莉的裁决

trans-unit.resname: BBD·43 | Zndrsplt's Judgment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend creates a token that's a copy of a creature they control. Each foe returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 为每位牌手分别选择友方或敌方。每位友方各选择一个由其操控的生物，然后派出一个为其复制品的衍生物。每位敌方各选择一个由其操控的生物，然后将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Zndrsplt retired from officiating when she teamed up with Okaun, but she still knows the penalties better than anyone else.
trans-unit.target: 自从与欧寇然搭档参赛后，岑斯莉就不再担任裁判一职，但她对罚则依旧有过人理解。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·44 | Archfiend of Despair | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 绝望翼邪鬼

trans-unit.source: Flying\nYour opponents can't gain life.\nAt the beginning of each end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life that player lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 对手不能获得生命。 在每个结束步骤开始时，每位对手各失去若干生命，其数量等同于该牌手在本回合所失去的生命数量。（伤害会导致失去生命。）

trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{5}。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: The ring plays host to some combatants that the spectators love to hate.
trans-unit.target: 某些恶名远播的竞技手会在这场地出赛。

trans-unit.source: Fan Favorite
trans-unit.target: 热门明星

trans-unit.source: Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)\n{2}: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{3}。） {2}：CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。任何牌手均可以起动此异能。

trans-unit.source: "Pathetic! I've heard more noise in a monastery. Let me hear you, Valor's Reach!"
trans-unit.target: 「真安静！就算是寺院都比这里更热闹。英勇巅，让我听见你们的声音！」

trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{X}。你选择X的数值。） 消灭目标力量等于或小于X的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Well, who do we have here, Gorm?"\n"No one, Virtus. No one at all."
trans-unit.target: 「古罗穆，瞧瞧这是谁？」 「谁都不是，维特兹。无名之辈。」

trans-unit.source: Inner Demon
trans-unit.target: 潜伏魔性

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, all non-Demon creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+2，具有飞行异能，且额外具有恶魔此类别。 当CARDNAME进战场时，所有非恶魔的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "There will be no secrets between us... like it or not."
trans-unit.target: 「我们之间不会有秘密. . . 不管你是否乐意。」

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，若你队伍操控另一个战士，则CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "I lead, destruction follows."
trans-unit.target: 「我当先，毁灭相随。」

trans-unit.source: The line between victory and defeat can be as slim as a razor's edge.
trans-unit.target: 胜负之间的界线，可能只有刀锋般纤细。

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个战士在你队伍的操控下进战场时，目标对手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Some competitors fight for glory or money. Some just like hitting people.
trans-unit.target: 有些选手为了荣耀或金钱而战。有些则只是喜欢揍人。

trans-unit.source: Thrilling Encore

trans-unit.target: 将所有于本回合中从战场置入所有坟墓场的生物牌在你的操控下放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "Welcome to the winning team."
trans-unit.target: 「欢迎加入获胜一方。」

trans-unit.target: 维特兹的灵动

trans-unit.source: Brutality had never been so exquisite.
trans-unit.target: 蛮横从未如此精致。

trans-unit.source: Azra Bladeseeker
trans-unit.target: 觅刃亚札人

trans-unit.source: "Never get too attached to a weapon. You must allow a better one to find its way to you."
trans-unit.target: 「别太依赖一件武器。你得给更好的武器留出空间。」

trans-unit.source: Bonus Round

trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, that player copies it and may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，每当任一牌手施放瞬间或法术咒语时，该牌手将其复制，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source: When the twin-spell bonus round begins, the crowd rises to its feet in anticipation of incredible combinations.
trans-unit.target: 当联咒竞技项目的加赛开始时，观众全都站了起来，期望能够看到更加精彩的配合。

trans-unit.source: There will always be a spot at Valor's Reach for headlong violence.
trans-unit.target: 简单直接的暴力打法总能在英勇巅中找到观众。

trans-unit.source: "Punch 'em, kick 'em, bite 'em, beat 'em! Burn 'em all and we'll defeat 'em!"
trans-unit.target: 「打他，踢他，咬他，揍他！ 全部烧干净，我们就赢了！」

trans-unit.target: 寇伐丝的怒火

trans-unit.target: 为每位牌手分别选择友方或敌方。每位友方各弃掉手牌，然后抓原数量加一的牌。CARDNAME对每位敌方各造成等同于其手牌数量的伤害。

trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{6}。） 践踏，敏捷

trans-unit.source: The stadium is well-stocked with hazards to force the action if combatants show too much caution.
trans-unit.target: 万一场上选手畏缩不前，竞技场内也准备好了各式威胁，能够迫使他们主动出击。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·62 | Najeela, the Blade-Blossom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Najeela, the Blade-Blossom
trans-unit.target: 剑花娜吉拉

trans-unit.source: Whenever a Warrior attacks, you may have its controller create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking.\n{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Untap all attacking creatures. They gain trample, lifelink, and haste until end of turn. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Activate this ability only during combat.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个战士攻击时，你可以令其操控者派出一个1/1白色战士衍生生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。 {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}：重置所有进行攻击的生物。它们获得践踏、系命与敏捷异能直到回合结束。在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段。你只可以于战斗中起动此异能。

trans-unit.target: 竞技场卖商

trans-unit.source: "Potions! Mana potions, health potions, energy potions—get your potions here!"
trans-unit.target: 「药剂！魔力药剂，生命药剂，能量药剂～这里全都有！」

trans-unit.source: Stolen Strategy
trans-unit.target: 战术遭窃

trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，放逐每位对手的牌库顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以施放所放逐之牌中的非地牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放这些咒语的费用。

trans-unit.source: "Within this grove, you belong to me."

trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{7}。） 践踏

trans-unit.source: Arena beasts are bred for flashiness and foul temper. An extra head addresses both requirements.
trans-unit.target: 竞技场野兽的培育目标是浮夸与暴躁。多一个头可以同时满足这两个要求。

trans-unit.source: Combo Attack

trans-unit.resname: BBD·67 | Combo Attack | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Two target creatures your team controls each deal damage equal to their power to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 两个目标由你队伍操控的生物各依本身力量对目标生物造成伤害。

trans-unit.source: Success at Valor's Reach requires not only individual skill but also the ability to merge that skill with a partner's.
trans-unit.target: 想在英勇巅获得成功，需要的不仅仅是个人技巧，还要有能力将之结合上搭档的技巧。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·68 | The Crowd Goes Wild | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Crowd Goes Wild
trans-unit.target: 欢呼震天

trans-unit.resname: BBD·68 | The Crowd Goes Wild | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.)\nSupport X. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures.)\nEach creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 助力（另一位牌手能够为此咒语的费用支付至多{X}。你选择X的数值。） 支援X（在至多X个目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。） 每个其上有+1/+1指示物的生物各获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Decorated Champion
trans-unit.target: 常胜斗士

trans-unit.resname: BBD·69 | Decorated Champion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Warrior enters the battlefield under your team's control, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个战士在你队伍的操控下进战场时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: The oddsmakers hate him because every fight is a foregone conclusion. The crowd loves him for exactly the same reason.
trans-unit.target: 开盘的人恨他，因为战斗的结果早已确定。群众则因为相同的原因爱他。

trans-unit.source: Generous Patron
trans-unit.target: 慷慨资助人

trans-unit.resname: BBD·70 | Generous Patron | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)\nWhenever you put one or more counters on a creature you don't control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，支援2。（在至多两个其他目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。） 每当你在一个不由你操控的生物上放置一个或数个指示物时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 巨口戈莎莫

trans-unit.resname: BBD·71 | Grothama, All-Devouring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other creatures have "Whenever this creature attacks, you may have it fight CARDNAME."\nWhen Grothama leaves the battlefield, each player draws cards equal to the amount of damage dealt to Grothama this turn by sources they controlled.
trans-unit.target: 其他生物具有「每当此生物攻击时，你可以让它与CARDNAME互斗。」 当戈莎莫离开战场时，每位牌手各抓若干牌，其数量等同于本回合中由其操控之来源对戈莎莫造成的伤害数量。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各可以从其牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于其手上，然后将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: She is adept at navigating the stadium's ever-changing landscape.
trans-unit.target: 她尤为擅长在竞技场不停变幻的地形中寻找出路。

trans-unit.target: 皮儿的奇想

trans-unit.source: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend searches their library for a land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library. Each foe sacrifices an artifact or enchantment they control.
trans-unit.target: 为每位牌手分别选择友方或敌方。每位友方各从其牌库中搜寻一张地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将其牌库洗牌。每位敌方各牺牲一个由其操控的神器或结界。

trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance, trample\nAs CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose artifact, enchantment, instant, sorcery, or planeswalker.\nPlayers can't cast spells of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒，践踏 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择神器、结界、瞬间、法术或鹏洛客。 牌手不能施放该类别的咒语。

trans-unit.source: "I never give odds on my own fights. Unless, of course, you want to bet *against* me . . ."
trans-unit.target: 「我从不为自己的战斗开盘。当然，除非你就是想跟我对赌. . .」

trans-unit.source: "Every creation carries a piece of its creators. Their knowledge, their dreams, their soul. That is the best part."

trans-unit.resname: BBD·221 | Enduring Scalelord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当在另一个由你操控的生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.
trans-unit.target: 只有洒在阿拉辛城墙上的阳光才能散出更耀眼的光辉。

trans-unit.source: Evil Twin
trans-unit.target: 邪恶双生子

trans-unit.resname: BBD·222 | Evil Twin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it gains "{U}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with the same name as this creature."
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，但它获得「{U}{B}，{T}：消灭目标与此生物同名的生物。」

trans-unit.source: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.
trans-unit.target: 等到邪恶的那一个在你身上捅把刀，就能认出来了。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·223 | Gwafa Hazid, Profiteer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gwafa Hazid, Profiteer
trans-unit.target: 投机客瓜法哈基

trans-unit.resname: BBD·223 | Gwafa Hazid, Profiteer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {W}{U}, {T}: Put a bribery counter on target creature you don't control. Its controller draws a card.\nCreatures with bribery counters on them can't attack or block.
trans-unit.target: {W}{U}，{T}：在目标不由你操控的生物上放置一个贿赂指示物。其操控者抓一张牌。 其上有贿赂指示物的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·223 | Gwafa Hazid, Profiteer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Everyone has a price."
trans-unit.target: 「人人都有价可询。」

trans-unit.source: Jelenn Sphinx
trans-unit.target: 杰连史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: BBD·224 | Jelenn Sphinx | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, other attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒 每当CARDNAME攻击时，其他进行攻击的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Few among the Azorius have ever spoken with the sphinxes, but all have felt their influence.
trans-unit.target: 很少有俄佐立人和史芬斯说过话，但是都能感受到他们的影响力。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·225 | Kiss of the Amesha | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kiss of the Amesha
trans-unit.target: 爱米莎之吻

trans-unit.resname: BBD·225 | Kiss of the Amesha | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player gains 7 life and draws two cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手获得7点生命且抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·225 | Kiss of the Amesha | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Once a year, Akrasa holds a joust that draws knights and their leotaus from every nation on Bant. The prize is an Akrasan sigil, but the true reward is the angel's kiss.
trans-unit.target: 阿卡沙每年会举办一次骑士比武，吸引班特全境的骑士与其座狮前来参与。奖品是一个阿卡沙印记，但真正的奖赏则是天使之吻。

trans-unit.source: Relentless Hunter
trans-unit.target: 无情猎手

trans-unit.resname: BBD·226 | Relentless Hunter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}{G}: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}{G}：直到回合结束，CARDNAME得+1/+1且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: "I swore to take one head for each member of my family they killed. My task is nowhere near its end."
trans-unit.target: 「我曾立誓为每位惨死它们手下的家人取回一颗首级。我的任务还远未结束。」

trans-unit.source: Rhox Brute
trans-unit.target: 罗克蛮汉

trans-unit.source: "In this new world, I have seen the once-devout rhoxes take up arms with the savages of Jund. I would be offended, but I see the wisdom in their choice."\n—Gernan, Dawnray archer
trans-unit.target: 「在这新世界，我见到以往虔诚的罗克与勇得野人一般拿起了武器。我不会为此高兴，但能了解他们这选择背后的智慧。」 ～晨辉箭手哲男

trans-unit.source: Riptide Crab
trans-unit.target: 激流蟹

trans-unit.resname: BBD·228 | Riptide Crab | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME死去时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: It sleeps with its claws open.
trans-unit.target: 它沉睡时仍张螯警戒。

trans-unit.target: 沸息蛮龙

trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，加{R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}。直到回合结束，你不会因步骤与阶段结束失去这份法术力。

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有践踏与系命异能。（具系命异能之生物所造成的伤害会让其操控者获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.source: Urborg Drake
trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格龙兽

trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME attacks each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.source: Relentless as the sea, remorseless as death.
trans-unit.target: 残酷如怒海，无情如死亡。

trans-unit.source: Consulate Skygate
trans-unit.target: 执政院空闸

trans-unit.target: 守军 延势（此生物能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。）

trans-unit.source: All skyships entering or leaving the fairgrounds must pass through the security checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 所有进出展区的飞船都必须由安检口通行。

trans-unit.source: Culling Dais
trans-unit.target: 牲祭高台

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{1}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card for each charge counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲一个生物：在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {1}，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME上每有一个充电指示物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Forswear the flesh and you will truly see."\n—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
trans-unit.target: 「抛弃肉身，你就能得到真知。」 ～核心卜算师金吉塔厦

trans-unit.source: Eager Construct
trans-unit.target: 热切组构体

trans-unit.resname: BBD·234 | Eager Construct | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各可以占卜1。（占卜1的流程是检视你牌库顶的牌，然后你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.source: Loyal to a fault, it anticipates its master's every need.
trans-unit.target: 它绝对忠诚，甚至会预测主人的 需要。

trans-unit.source: Genesis Chamber
trans-unit.target: 创生秘室

trans-unit.resname: BBD·235 | Genesis Chamber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, if CARDNAME is untapped, that creature's controller creates a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物进战场时，若CARDNAME未横置，则该生物的操控者派出一个1/1无色秘耳衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: "As the experimental population grows, so do the number of myr. It's a perfect equilibrium."\n—Memnarch
trans-unit.target: 「当实验族群的数量增加时，秘耳的数量也会增加。真是个完美的平衡。」 ～蒙纳珂

trans-unit.source: Gold-Forged Sentinel
trans-unit.target: 金铸哨兵

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Blessed by the gods. Coveted by mortals. Beholden to neither.
trans-unit.target: 随诸神降福，任众生祈盼，仍无偏无倚。

trans-unit.source: Hexplate Golem
trans-unit.target: 六角板魔像

trans-unit.source: "Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . . even the ground must join our cause."\n—Ezuri, renegade leader
trans-unit.target: 「什么都用。钢，锈，废铁. . . 就连土地都该站在我们这边。」 ～叛军领袖伊祖黎

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。 CARDNAME不能被墙阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Many a besieged city has surrendered upon hearing the distinctive rumble of the juggernaut.
trans-unit.target: 许多被围攻的城市一听到攻城巨车那独特的轰鸣声便缴械投降。

trans-unit.source: Millennial Gargoyle

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "You've got to keep your wits about you on the roofs. Not all stones are compliant handholds."\n—Iveta, rooftop runner
trans-unit.target: 「你在高处时必须临危不乱，并非所有石头都能让你抓稳。」 ～屋顶奔越者依薇塔

trans-unit.source: Mind's Eye
trans-unit.target: 灵眼

trans-unit.resname: BBD·240 | Mind's Eye | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Ideas drift like petals on the wind. I have only to lift my face to the breeze."
trans-unit.target: 「灵思如风中花瓣般飘飞；我只需面朝着微风。」

trans-unit.source: Mycosynth Lattice
trans-unit.target: 构生菌格栅

trans-unit.resname: BBD·241 | Mycosynth Lattice | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types.\nAll cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless.\nPlayers may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 所有永久物均额外具有神器此类别。 所有咒语、永久物以及不在战场上的牌均为无色。 牌手可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·242 | Night Market Guard | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 晚市守卫

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can block an additional creature each combat.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每次战斗可以额外多阻挡一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: BBD·242 | Night Market Guard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One head watches for Consulate enforcers. The other watches for renegade thieves."\n—Crime Lord Gonti
trans-unit.target: 「一个脑袋留意执政院执法者，一个脑袋监视乱匠盗贼。」 ～犯罪头子贡提

trans-unit.source: Peace Strider
trans-unit.target: 和平神行客

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle."\n—Kessla, Sylvok shaman
trans-unit.target: 「这必定是消失的一代从彼方送来，好助我们渡过此劫。」 ～希沃克祭师凯丝拉

trans-unit.target: 穿刺神行客

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Pain isn't a negative stimulus. Pain is a sign of your imperfection."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「痛苦并非负面的刺激。痛苦是你未臻完美的讯号。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {2}，{T}：占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.source: A light to bring hope in dark times.
trans-unit.target: 黑暗时期的希望之光。

trans-unit.target: {T}：选择一位牌手。该牌手加一点法术力，其颜色由其选择。

trans-unit.source: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.
trans-unit.target: 第一批探照灯是赠送给前来签署十会盟的密使，象征着合作无间。

trans-unit.source: Stone Golem
trans-unit.target: 石魔像

trans-unit.source: The sculptor, like most artists, put his heart and soul into his work. But the newly awakened golem decided it wanted its creator's other, more tangible parts.
trans-unit.target: 其雕塑师一如其他的艺师，将心血与灵魂注入自己的作品。但这甫苏醒的魔像决定了：自己需要创造者其他更加具象的部分。

trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: Tap target creature.

+2: Until your next turn, up to two target creatures each have base power and toughness 0/3 and lose all abilities.

Partner with Rowan Kenrith
CARDNAME can be your commander.
